hero_title: India rama Khualzin himna tichian ang che
hero_subtitle: India rama khualzinte ṭanpuina leh himna tichian turin hna a thawk famkim (comprehensive monitoring system) a ni.
tourist_protection_desc: India rama khualzinte himna tichian turin vênna leh chinchang hriattirna (real-time monitoring and alerts) a awm.
location_tracking_desc: Mamawh huna hmun hriatna (location tracking) him leh thuruk vawn (privacy-respecting) a ni.
emergency_response: Chhiat Rûk Thil Thlen Huna Chhân Lêtna (Emergency Response)
emergency_response_desc: Khualzin leh Sawrkar official-te chhiat ruk thil thlen huna an inbiak theih nan, hna thawk rang tak (rapid response) a ni.
secure_docs_desc: Khualzin document leh hriat tur dangte (data) vawn him leh dik ngei tura blockchain hmanga vawn himna (secure storage) a ni.
mission_para1: Khualzin Vengtu (Tourist Safety Monitor) hi India Sawrkarin ram chhung leh ram pawna khualzinte himna leh ṭanpuina tihchak (strengthen) tura a ruahmanna a ni. Kan thil tum chu khualzinte India ramah him leh hlim takin an zin thei tih tichian turin technology hmangin vênna leh chhan lêtna (response) famkim siam a ni.
mission_para2: Vênna hna thawk chho (real-time monitoring), chhiat ruk thil thlen huna chhân lêtna rang (rapid emergency response), leh hriat tur dangte vawn himna (secure documentation) hmangin, India ram hi khualzinna hmun him ber pawl a nih theih nan leh an nun leh hriat tur (data) an zahpui loh nan (respect for life and privacy) hma kan la a ni.
privacy_data_collection_title: Hriat Tur Dangte Pawm Khawm (Data Collection)
privacy_data_collection: Khualzin Vengtu (Tourist Safety Monitor) hian khualzinte hriat tur pawimawh (essential data), an passport leh zinkawng (travel itinerary) te, chhiat ruk thil thlen huna ṭanpuina an beisei theih nan a pawm khawm a ni. Hmun hriatna (location data) chu app-in phalna a neih chauhvin a la a ni.
privacy_data_usage: Hriat tur pawm khawmte chu khualzinte himna tichianna atan chauh hman a ni. Hriat turte chu chhiat ruk thil thlen huna chhan lêtna atan emaw, danin a phut huna Sawrkar official-te hnenah chauh hrilh theih a ni.
privacy_data_security_title: Hriat Tur Vawn Him Dan (Data Security)
privacy_data_security: Khualzinte document-te chu himna leh dikna tichian turin blockchain hmangin vawn him a ni. Mobile app leh server-a hriat turte inthleng (data transfer) chu protocol pangngai (standard protocols) hmangin vawn him a ni.
privacy_data_retention_title: Hriat Tur Vawn Rei Dan (Data Retention)
privacy_data_retention: Khualzin hriat turte chu India rama an awm chhung leh chu mi aṭanga ni **30** hnuah chauh vawn a ni, chu mi hnuah chuan an hriat tur zawng zawng chu tihchhiat (destroyed) a ni. Hriat tur thlithlai (analytics) atana siam erawh chu rei deuh vawn theih a ni.
